summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the dedication and improvement of public rights of way to be known as Northeast 100th Street, between existing 1st Avenue Northeast and existing 5th Avenue Northeast; 3rd Avenue Northeast from said Northeast 100th Street to Northeast 97th Street, 4th Avenue Northeast from said Northeast 100th Street to Northeast 97th Street, and Northeast 97th Street between the south ends of said 3rd Avenue Northeast and said 4th Avenue Northeast, and authorizing the execution of an agreement in such connection with Northgate Centers, Inc.
